applet_name: Main Site RSS To Evernote
applet_description: New Feed Item post to Evernote

applet_name: Sync Evernote and Todoist
applet_description: Two way syncing of Evernote notes and Todoist tasks

applet_name: Add a task to Todoist Inbox for every note tagged with "Todoist" in Evernote
applet_description: Create a task in your Todoist Inbox if you add "Todoist" tag to any notes in Evernote. It uses the Todoist formatting syntax to create a hyperlink in the task title to the note, using note's title and PublicUrl of the note.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: Save your favorite tweets in an Evernote notebook
applet_description: Every time you favorite a tweet this Applet will grab it and collect in an Evernote notebook named "Favorite tweets"

applet_name: Automatically add new tasks with a specific label to Evernote
applet_description: This Applet will sync any tasks with a specific label (you could use Evernote) to a new note in the Evernote notebook of your choice. Sync it up, and get it done!

applet_name: New note with a specific tag in Evernote to Notion.
applet_description: Adds Evernotes note with a specific tag to Notion.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: Sync Evernote notebook to Google Drive
applet_description: Every new note created in an Evernote notebook creates a new document in Google Drive

applet_name: Log completed Todoist Tasks to one Evernote note
applet_description: Keep track of your completed Todoist tasks in an appended Evernote note.

applet_name: Evernote Note (with a specific tag) saved to Day One
applet_description: When you tag an Evernote note with a specific tag, a new Day One journal entry will be created.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: Save my iOS reminders to an Evernote checklist
applet_description: This Recipe adds a to-do to a note when you create an iOS reminder.  The Note which the to-do item is saved to will be the same name as the List of the original reminder.

applet_name: Copy new Evernote notes to OneNote
applet_description: This Applet will copy new notes in an Evernote notebook to OneNote.

applet_name: Evernote To Do from email
applet_description: Forward an email with #todo in subject and a To Do checklist will be created/appended.

applet_name: Send Instapaper highlights to Evernote
applet_description: Send Instapaper highlights to Evernote

applet_name: Save your Instagram photos in Evernote
applet_description: Automatically store the Instagram photos you post to an Evernote notebook

applet_name: When you create a new task in Google Tasks create a Note in Evernote
applet_description: This Applet will automatically create a note in Evernote with all the details of your task from Google Tasks.

applet_name: Append Twitter Favorites to Evernote Note.
applet_description: Append Twitter Favorites to Evernote Note.

applet_name: Liked YouTube Videos append to a note in Evernote
applet_description: Just a long awaited function.

applet_name: Create Evernote journal based on Google Calendar events
applet_description: Uses Evernote as a journal by creating a new "entry" for every event on your calendar.

applet_name: Quickly create a note
applet_description: This Applet gives you a distraction-free way to send a quick note to the notebook of your choice. It can be used as a widget — just click it, type your note, and send it off. It'll be waiting in Evernote for you to add to when you have time.

applet_name: Add your Alexa To-Dos to Evernote
applet_description: Evernote will be updated with new To Dos each time a new Alexa To Do is created.
applet_Trigger: Item added to your To Do List

applet_name: Track new Evernote notes on your Welltory Dashboard
applet_description: See what impacts the number of your notes

applet_name: Save your iPhone screenshots to an Evernote notebook
applet_description: This Applet uses Public Photo URLs which creates a unique link for each of your screenshots. For access to all of the links created by your Applets, visit https://ifttt.com/files

applet_name: IOS Screen captures to Evernote
applet_description: Whenever a screen is captured on my IOS device, send it to Evernote and tag it as: IFTTT & IOS ScrCap

applet_name: Combines all the highlights of an article in Instapaper in one note in Evernote
applet_description: Combines all the highlights of an article in Instapaper in one note in Evernote

applet_name: Add new Evernote notes to Akiflow as tasks
applet_description: This Evernote - Akiflow integration makes it easy to create a new task automatically when you add a specific tag to a note.
applet_Trigger: Add a specific tag to note

applet_name: A checklist of completed Todoist tasks in Evernote
applet_description: Each completed Todoist task is appended to an Evernote note with a checklist

applet_name: Add to a note in Evernote
applet_description: This Applet offers a totally distraction-free way of saving your ideas, todos, or wish list to Evernote.

applet_name: Save your Evernote to Histre
applet_description: Use this applet to save the note you take on Evernote into your Histre notebook.

applet_name: RSS to OneDrive, OneNote, Evernote, Nimbus
applet_description: RSS to OneDrive, OneNote, Evernote, Nimbus

applet_name: Speak notes to Evernote using Siri and iOS Reminders
applet_description: First, create a reminders list called "Evernote" in your iOS Reminders app. Then tell Siri, "Add Evernote reminder [your note here]". This will create a new reminder in your Evernote list, which in turn will append the dictated message to a note in Evernote called "Siri Notes".

applet_name: Log sent SMS to Evernote
applet_description: Logs SMS messages to Evernote, remember to pick your notebook and set your tags!

applet_name: Save all your RescueTime reports ot @evernote
applet_description: Save all your daily reports to Evernote

applet_name: Back up your Facebook status updates to Evernote
applet_description: Back up your Facebook status updates to Evernote

applet_name: Keep a list of Shazam-ed songs
applet_description: My Shazam songs added to an Evernote list
applet_Trigger: New track added to a playlist

applet_name: Record your weight measurements in an Evernote note
applet_description: Record your weight measurements in an Evernote note
applet_Trigger: When I have a new weight

applet_name: Record of any phone call answered
applet_description: On android record the details of any phone call answered and add it to an Evernote Phone Book

applet_name: Save post from Telegram to Evernote
applet_description: Simple applet to save posts to read it later in Evernote.

applet_name: Add your Alexa shopping list items to Evernote
applet_description: Evernote will be updated with new shopping list items each time a new item is added to your Alexa shopping list.
applet_Trigger: Item added to your Shopping List

applet_name: Export Instapaper Highlights to Evernote
applet_description: Fulfilling my lifelong dream of a digital commonplace book.

applet_name: When you create a new note in Evernote create a task in Google Tasks
applet_description: This Applet will automatically create a task in Google Tasks with all the details of your note from Evernote. The Task created in Google Tasks will default to a due date of when the Evernote note was created.

applet_name: Log works hours in an Evernote note
applet_description: This Recipe will track when you enter and leave a specific area on a map — in this case, your office! Keep track of your working hours each day in a single note.
applet_Trigger: You enter or exit an area

applet_name: Append note
applet_description: Append note
applet_Trigger: Every day of the week at

applet_name: Add Checkbox
applet_description: At certain time append checkbox
applet_Trigger: Every day of the week at

applet_name: Tweets from TC
applet_description: Tweets from TC
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Log Receipts In Evernote
applet_description: Take pictures of your receipts to create a log in Evernote

applet_name: Automatically create a Trello card when you add a new note to a specific notebook
applet_description: Sync your systems: this Applet will transform your new notes to Trello cards on the board and list you specify.
